Meet our BrandIT team next week at Merge + plus our featured domains

BrandIT and Igloo have strategically aligned to offer our clients the highest level of quality, integrity, innovation and service. The combination of BrandIT’s and Igloo’s skills and teams create a highly differentiated company uniquely positioned to bring a fresh approach to corporate domain services. In the rapidly evolving world of the Internet, you need a trusted partner who will care about your brand’s success. Our experts have a wealth of knowledge and experience working with clients across multiple verticals from start-ups to global brands and will work with you to determine the most effective strategy when it comes to your trademarks and domain names, how you can maximize the impact and reach of your domain portfolio,  which ccTLDs and which of the new gTLDs you should be considering, and how you can consolidate your portfolio to ensure it meets your objectives in an effective way.Our vision is simple: To have the best reputation in the industry.

On the sales side, Igloo.com Domain Advisors work with companies to maximize sales prices when divesting of their online assets while our branding and acquisitions experts specialize in securing domain names already registered by someone else, or any other intellectual property your business may benefit from owning including trademarks, patents or even social media handles. Whether it's to add to your investment portfolio or for your personal website, start-up or Fortune 500 company, finding the right domain will get you one step closer to realizing your goals. Igloo Domain Advisors have helped hundreds of companies stake their claim online, rebrand, or simply acquire descriptive domain names to help set them apart from their competition. With over $120 million in successful transactions behind us, our results oriented team offers the knowledge and understanding necessary to ensure you achieve your goal. The Igloo team is unparalleled in experience, knowledge and most importantly, results. Check out some of Igloo's clients here: https://www.igloo.com/brandstoriesIgloo Domain Advisors take the time to develop a thorough understanding of who you are, how you think and what matters most to you. It's a relationship combining know-how with know-you to bring your unique vision to light. In 2013 DomainAdvisors acquired the Igloo.com domain name because we wanted a distinct brand to represent our new direction and growing company. We chose Igloo because it's fresh, creates interest and provides a lasting, memorable image with our clients and within the industry. We found our cool and are ready to help you find yours.

There has been a long standing need in the internet industry for domain owners and online businesses to be given the opportunity to entrust one company with the expertise required to assist them in the overall planning and execution of their domain strategy.To fill that void, DomainAdvisors offers resources with the knowledge and understanding necessary to provide invaluable guidance during the entire lifecycle of a domain. Our dedicated advisors stay focused on trends impacting the domain industry as well as new regulations or policies that could potentially impact the domain market.Domains can be complicated and DomainAdvisors provides you the opportunity to leverage years of industry experience to help maximize your success. Domain services range from sales, acquisitions, consulting, appraisals, and secure transfer and escrow.

Responsible for oversight and coordination of core domain businesses (including DomainManager, DM Pro and DomainAdvisors) as well as additional projects and strategic partnerships associated with the PPX International group.www.PPXi.comwww.DomainAdvisors.comwww.DomainManager.comwww.DMPro.com

The PPX International group has a significant commitment to philanthropy throughout the world. As the Director of Philanthropy my responsibilities include scoping of new philanthropic projects, monitoring existing programs, ensuring the viability and sustainability of ongoing commitments and evaluation of commercial investments on behalf of the fund.
